name: Repurposed Cosmetic Bag or Pouch
description:
This is the cutest cosmetic bag, hip fabric from upholstery and drapery departments.  The fabric is high-quality and I can never throw away fabric, so it piles up until it becomes something really cute and useful!  Zipper closure.  

Measures:  4 x 6.5"

Ships in 100% Biodegradable and reuseable packaging.

Thank you for stopping by my shop.

name: Flip Flop Small Tote Beach Bag
description:
If you love flip flops, you will adore this tote bag!

Like my small tote denim bag, you can fit just about anything you would from your purse.  Add small books or use it for a lunch bag.   Inside has matching polka-dotted fabric, so cute!!

Crystals have been added for a special touch, especially when it hits the sunlight.

Approximate size:

11 inches across
10 inches wide
3 inches deep

Matching larger tote bag SOLD OUT!

name: Heavy Denim Unisex Travel Bag
description:
Fabulous fabric....great for anyone!

Simple and chic. Stylish and carefree. Just the perfect size to carry all your important "must have's". I use this style and it's perfect size to carry it all. Great for Ipad and a carry on when traveling!!

General Market Bag made with NEW a copper tone dirty denim cotton. Sturdy , durable and pretty!  Accent fabric is 100% cotton with a map pattern and a stripe inside.  Two inside pockets.

Bag Measures:

15 1/2" Tall
16 1/2" Wide
20" Straps
Small " Base

2 Inside Pockets

*Absolutely stunning industrial feel.....


Fabric has been pre-washed

name: Whimsical Tote Bag
description:
If you love fabric, you will love this bag! It's a mix of fun colors and designs. The flower is outlined in hand-sewn crystals. Crystal gem stones glued in various spots, can add more if you like more! Mix of black, whites, lime green, yellows and pink florals.

Back side of bag is a pink floral screen print design. All home dec fabrics which are water proof. LIning is mainly drapery lining with the lime green and white home dec fabric carried through. Inside bottom of bag has card board covered with fabric for support. Two inside pockets. 

Approximate measurements:

13 inches across
14 inches high
3 inches deep


Can also add magnet closure, please let me know with your order.


This will make a great gift for you or someone you love!!

It's fun and for all age groups.

name: Versatile Summer Gauze Tunic Top for those Hot Summer Days and Nites!
description:
Bacci® Summer Tunic is made with a sheer light weight 100% cotton medallion print in green, navy and cream.  Wear with jeans, shorts, skirt or with matching drawstring pant (coming soon!).  Wear it as a cutie nightie for those hot summer nights.

Pull over with elastic across top and under bust.  Measures 21" from top to bottom and 15" from under bust line to bottom.  Bust fits 32-34" (sm, med).

There's no two tops that are identical - will list them separately and uniquely!  They may look the same, but will have slight variations.

More colors coming soon - hot pinks and lime greens!!

name: Bacci® Sensational  Summer Nightie
description:
Ciao!  

Bacci® brings back the Summer Nightie or this breezy, floral top can be worn with a great pair of skinny jeans , shorts or a flowing skirt for a more formal event.  Removal flower can be removed and clipped in your hair or worn on another garment.  Straps cross across the back and the top is elastic for easy fit and wear.  This top will fit sizes 32"-34" chest.

Floral print is a poly blend with 100% cotton strapping.

Length measures 16" from under bodice.

Hand made in the USA!!

name: Bacci® Toddler Nap Mat
description:
Cool, calming colors for your little one will cause them to murmur the inside message as they sleep in this stylish Nap Mat. 

WARM - COZY - DURABLE 

"THE COMFORT OF HOME WHEN YOUR CHILD IS AWAY"

Measurement: 25"W x 49"L Blanket is 1 1/2 the width of the mat to wrap around toddler!

Your toddler will enjoy this nap mat for years to come! Recommended between the ages of 1-7 years. Perfect to hand down or to pass on! 

This mat is made with a pre-washed, heavy weight 100% Cotton. Beautiful, durable, warm. But it's the irresistible fabric combination that will draw you to this mat. The inside bottom is done in a mint flannel complimented by "I love Mommy & Daddy" flleece. 

With all my nap mats, I use modern and spirited collection of fabrics with fresh, invigorating colors and design. The outside is made of heavy weight denim or home dec fabrics. The inside is lined with warm and comfortable flannel and fleece! 


Designer fabric - 100% Heavy Weight Cotton 
Anti- Pill Fleece -100% polyester
Flannel - 100% cotton
Batting - Polyester Soft & Bright and Premium Fiberfill


MADE IN THE USA

Care Instructions:

Occasional hand or machine wash on gentle, cool cycle; air dry flat; iron if necessary. Designer fabrics and flannels have all been pre-washed and shrunk without any chemicals or detergents.

name: Spectacular Bacci® Unisex Messenger Bag
description:
If you like retro, recycling and repurposing, you will love this Bacci® messenger bag. High quality fashion statement! Inside has flannel piece for extra protection for your laptop or IPad.  Originally this piece was a man's London Fog trench coat.   Bacci® loves to promote GREEN, for future generations to come!!  

--------------------
Details
--------------------
Two very large, original pockets, on the outside. One under front flap and one in the back. Inside has two large pockets and pen holders. Very spacious yet not cumbersome. 

---------------------
Measurement
---------------------

14 1/2 " wide
11 1/2" long
1 1/2 " deep

Strap is adjustable

name: Bacci Cosmetic Bag
description:
This is a cute and elegant cosmetic bag, hip fabric from our recycled fabric. The outside fabric is a beautiful off white on white damask and the inside is a cool, crisp, burnt orange raw silk.  The fabric is high-quality and will wear for years.

Measures 4 x 6 perfect to carry in any size purse or on its own.

Like all Bacci wear, ships in 100% Biodegradable and reuseable packaging.

name: Reduce, ReUse, Recycle, Repurposed Trench Coat
description:
One-Of-A-Kind!

Once a vintage style trench coat now a useable, adorable clutch style purse in its second life.  Measures 9 1/2" wide by 7" deep.  Maxima zipper is repurposed from another pocketbook and the rosette and inside lining is made from high quality scrap upholstery fabric.  Strap measures 24" and also comes from a vintage leather black back.  

Waterproof 

Support ReMade in the USA!

We use 100% Biodegradable and reuseable packaging for shipping.

name: Bacci Cotton Lycra Yoga with Colored Roll Down Waistband
description:
Spice up your collection of average solid yoga pants with the Bacci  logo roll waist yoga pant.  Experience the extra comfort of our breathable blend of soft cotton lycra. These pants allow for ultimate performance, with the added style you deserve. To the yoga mat, gym, or for a day of lounging, the roll waist pant has a classic slightly flaired leg cut, that is a must add to your workout collection.

Knit cotton yoga pant with a roll down waist band, flared 32" inseam 95% Cotton 5% spandex.

All prints are done by hand on a manual press using reclaimed ink.

Small 2-4, Medium 6-8, Large 10-12

Black and Purple

Bacci means "kisses" and with the butterfly it means "Butterfly Kisses".

Ships in Eco-Friendly, ReUsable bags.

Wholesale Orders:  Please contact me directly for information on wholesale pricing.

name: Timeless Paris Style Hand Knit Scarf
description:
Bacci Designs uses three various types of textures, colors and materials in creating this beautiful tri-knit scarf.  Beautiful tones of burnt orange, blues, golds and browns will blend and wear well with anything from denim to silk.  

Measures:  72"L x 8"W

Hand wash in cold water and lay flat to dry

Materials:

Tri-Color Yarn is made out of:
45% Wool
2% Cotton
16% Viscose
9% Acrylic 

Burnt Orange Yarn:
40% Cotton
60% Nylon

Sky Blue:
36% Acrylic
35% Rayon
15% Wool
14% Nylon

Ships in ReUsable Eco-Friendly Bags

name: Eco-friendly, Unique gift, useful keychain, chapstick, USB holder and more, accessory keychain.
description:
Eco-friendly and surprisingly useful! Let me help you never forget where you left your favorite lipstick, much needed chapstick, keys, USB stick, headphones, tees, pens, jewelry and more!! 

UMB's are repurposed from unwanted and unclaimed umbrellas, so you are helping the environment!!

This Item:

Black nylon umbrella fabric outside with red nylon inside and outside accents. Silver "D" ring with clasp to use for keychain, belt loop, water bottle and pocketbooks. Silver charm with engraved flower pattern.

Measures:

Width: 1.75"
Length: 4.50"

UMB's ship in 100% Biodegradable peace of mind packaging!

name: Bacci Soft Pink and Grey Sheer Longer Length Jersey Tee
description:
100% combed and ring-spun cotton 3.2 oz.  

All prints are done by hand on a manual press using reclaimed ink.

Message from Bacci: The butterfly is the symbol of metamorphosis and transformation. The symbol of new life, letting go of old cycles and finding your true inner expression. The butterfly calls you to expand your awareness, spread your wings and call forth your inner joy.

name: Bacci Pink and Purple Sheer Longer Length Tee
description:
100% combed and ring-spun cotton 3.2 oz.  

Separate by color, wash in cold water, tumble dry, iron if necessary.

All prints are done by hand on a manual press using reclaimed ink.

The butterfly is the symbol of metamorphosis and transformation. The symbol of new life, letting go of old cycles and finding your true inner expression. The butterfly calls you to expand your awareness, spread your wings and call forth your inner joy.
